text:
Where an employer withholds
taxes from a tipped employee based upon a percentage of sales, rather than on
reported tips, a reduction in an individual employee’s net pay may result, but
this is not an FLSA violation. Employees who contact WH alleging
over-withholding should be referred to the nearest IRS office.

Employees who contact WH alleging over-withholding should be referred to the nearest IRS office.
